summary: Do you get to Nazeem very often? Oh, what am I saying, of course you don't.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#746040][size=+4][b]Nazeemify[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center]This mod only add the spell that a target's face is transformed to Nazeem's.[/center]


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Features[/size][/color][/heading]
You can nazeemify NPC's face. This means that his/her face turns to Nazeem-like.

Nazeemified faces are left until Skyrim is finished. On restarting Skyrim, faces will be undone.


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/color][/heading][list]
[*]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 +
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/url] 1.6.16 +
[/list]


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Installation[/size][/color][/heading]
Copy or cut [code][color=#998780]Data[/color][/code] folder and paste to Skyrim [code][color=#998780]Data[/color][/code] folder.


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/heading]
Delete all files you installed.


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/color][/heading]
This mod only add spell, so this is compatible with almost all mods.
And I think that this section is the most useless. If there were problems, who would be inconvenienced?


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Permission[/size][/color][/heading]
You can use this mod without getting permission from me.
Crediting me is not either required. Feel free to use.
Of course I would be glad if you credit me in description, readme or something.


[heading][color=#746040][size=+2]Postscript[/size][/color][/heading]
[center][i]Oh, it took years, but I earned my way to the top. I own Chillfurrow Farm, you see. Very successful business. Obviously.[/i][/center]
[right]Nazeem - Whiterun[/right]

[line]

Have a enjoy.
author: scripthoge
